title: Zambos Tostones with Whipped Ricotta and Strawberry Sauce
instructions: Step 1: In a food processor or blender, pour the ricotta cheese, Greek yogurt, lemon zest, olive oil, cayenne pepper, and cilantro. Process until you have a creamy texture for the cheesecake.
Step 2: Place the cheesecake on a flat dish.
Step 3: In a bowl, combine balsamic vinegar, lemon juice, and strawberry jam. Add salt to taste. Let it marinate for 1 hour.
Step 4: On top of the cheesecake dish, place the chopped strawberries in the center. Pour the strawberry sauce to taste. And place pieces of Plantain Chips on top.
